Hi.

> Since we are on the subject of Ocha;=A0 I was wondering if anyone co=
uld 
> remeber
>  the grades fo Tea...=A0 There is one that is held in very=
 high 
> regard...=A0 and
>  then there are lower class teas...=A0 if anyon=
e cold give me this 
> information=A0 I
>  would be very interessted...=A0 =
and a source for those teas would also 
> be good..
>  Thanks in advance...=
=A0
Tea is an extremely messy subject. There are several different plants 
=
used to make one sort of tea or another. There are several different 
tea c=
eremonies before you even start talking about tea schools. The 
earliest ty=
pe of tea introduced to Japan was called dancha and is 
practically undrink=
able. Or at least, it never became particularly 
popular. I suggest that yo=
u read one of the introductory tea books. For 
example, there is one in Eng=
lish by Sen Shoshitsu. I believe that 
Herbert Plutschow has also written a=
 book about tea.
